name: Mini Gardens - Logic Puzzle
description:
An instant garden

Draw a single continuous loop

Solve the puzzle and reveal a beautiful scene



Mini Gardens is a logical puzzle Inspired by Japanese puzzles.


🌸 Designed for lovers of logic puzzles;
🌻 50 handcrafted stages to be solved;
💐 Puzzle sizes: 6x6, 8x8 and 10x10
🌼 Enjoy 15 beautiful environments;
🌹 Original soundtrack, designed to keep you immersed and focused on the game;
🌼 Lots of love and thought in every detail of the game;
